entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
